title: Aircraft titles font
content:
Hello

I am working on some illustrations and wish to identify the font used by the Polish Air Force on their aircraft - see the attached image. It seems very familiar yet I can't identify it in this context.

Many thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014124914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Republic%20of%20Poland_6615.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014124914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rzecz_6033.jpg)
author: merisi
